channel.title: christinasots_ TikTok
channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from christinasots_

item.title: GARLIC MUSHROOMS ON CREAMY TAHINI BEANS I eat a variation of this dish every week, usually as a fridge raid and with whatever veggies I have that need using up. A creamy beany base is perfect for mushrooms, broccoli, courgette or even just a load of sauté
item.description: GARLIC MUSHROOMS ON CREAMY TAHINI BEANS I eat a variation of this dish every week, usually as a fridge raid and with whatever veggies I have that need using up. A creamy beany base is perfect for mushrooms, broccoli, courgette or even just a load of sauté

item.description: QUICK PICKLED RED ONIONS! My most used condiment by far. The easiest and quickest way to add some crunch and zest to any dish. Let me know your fave way to use it! 1 red onion 100ml apple cider vinegar 1 - 1 1/2 tsp flakey sea salt 1 tsp sugar or aga

item.title: Smacked cucumber but make it beany!! Hannah from @Bold Bean Co came over to make some beany recipes with me and the second one we made was this DELICIOUS tenderstem brocolli, smacked cucumber and black bean salad with a satay-ish sauce and a load of fresh

item.title: If you’ve never tried the combination of tahini with date syrup, let me tell you that it’s the most decadent, indulgent caramel-y drizzle that ever existed. Creamy, nutty and perfectly balanced sweetness. So of course it was insanely good on an affogato!
item.description: If you’ve never tried the combination of tahini with date syrup, let me tell you that it’s the most decadent, indulgent caramel-y drizzle that ever existed. Creamy, nutty and perfectly balanced sweetness. So of course it was insanely good on an affogato!

item.title: Silken tofu is the ideal speedy lunch or dinner so I always keep some in the cupboard. This is a really delicious and summery way to eat it! Full recipe is below and also on my website (link in my bio). Ingredients: 1 x 300g box silken tofu 15g toasted
item.description: Silken tofu is the ideal speedy lunch or dinner so I always keep some in the cupboard. This is a really delicious and summery way to eat it! Full recipe is below and also on my website (link in my bio). Ingredients: 1 x 300g box silken tofu  15g toasted

item.title: I found the perfect vegan brownie recipe on the @GuardianFeast app! There are so many vegan recipes on there! There are also loads of great features like the search bar which lets you search by your favourite chefs, dietaries, ingredients and meal type.
item.description: I found the perfect vegan brownie recipe on the @GuardianFeast app! There are so many vegan recipes on there!  There are also loads of great features like the search bar which lets you search by your favourite chefs, dietaries, ingredients and meal type.

item.title: Greek style lemony potatoes. These are the easiest, fluffiest, softest potatoes around and they need to be on your Sunday table. Cooking them like this gets them so soft and allows the flavours of the lemon and seasonings to really get absorbed all the w

item.title: If you’re looking for a creamy, cosy bowl of goodness that you can make in 10 minutes - you’ve just found one. A dollop of vegan cream cheese mixed with the cherry tomato juice and the butterbean aquafaba magincally turns into a delicious velvety broth.
item.description: If you’re looking for a creamy, cosy bowl of goodness that you can make in 10 minutes - you’ve just found one. A dollop of vegan cream cheese mixed with the cherry tomato juice and the butterbean aquafaba magincally turns into a delicious velvety broth.
